description:
Khoury and Ash both wanted to catch Gible after they saw how powerful and strong it was when it hurled a large rock at them during their first encounter in a forest near Suiren Town.
Ash, Dawn, Khoury and Lyra all used fishing rods with Pok√©mon food as bait which Khoury had prepared. Eventually Khoury was able to capture it after it had a fortitude contest with Khoury`s Totodile which severely injured itself during the process weaking it.
name: Fukamaru (Kazunari)
